issue.title: [Go] invalid Stringer implementation for array.Boolean
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5119](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5119). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Stringer implementation of array.Boolean loops over the `[]byte` array (which may not have the correct number of entries wrt the bool content) instead of using array.Interface.Len.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5119?focusedCommentId=16810309) by Sebastien Binet (sbinet):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4112
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4112>
